about_the_game:
Are you a score-chaser or speedrunn fan, a casual player, or a tryharder looking for a speed challenge? This game is for you and it won't cost you anything but your time!


We've all rushed through the first level of a video game or tried out time trials. In that mind, Super Jetboy World is a fast-paced 2D platformer with new and original mechanics that make the game's speed challenges accessible to everyone, no matter your skill level. Each level's gameplay is broken down into multiple sections, allowing you to retry each segment, giving you a margin of error to achieve your perfect run and best score without pressure or frustration! The controls are easy to grasp, and every level is designed to be satisfying and fun to play, all while maintaining a certain level of difficulty.



Worried you won’t measure up? No worries! In this game, you set your own goals, allowing for difficulty tailored to you. The game will only require you to surpass a small score objective based on player feedback to progress in the adventure and master the game. But every effort is rewarded, whether it's achieving an excellent score, completing a run without dying, or finishing bonus challenges. If you're a speed lover or have always watched speedruns, this is your chance to give it a shot!



Super Jetboy World actually perfects the formula of its predecessor, simply "Super Jetboy" (or "Super Jetboy Legacy") created in 2 days for the first edition of the SpeedJam, a game jam focused on score-chasing and speedrunning. With the experience gained since then, the power of the Godot engine, and no time constraints, Super Jetboy World delivers a superior experience, succeeding where the first game fell short, while keeping its soul and iconic theme that you'll soon hear. Super Jetboy World also draws inspiration from top speedrun and 2D platformer titles like Super Meatboy, Celeste, and Pizza Tower, aiming to deliver an experience close to these amazing games, for free.



The story’s recipe is simple and relevant (at least in 2024):
  • A rogue AI obsessed with progress at the cost of all living beings
  • Endearing friends and foes with hidden pasts and secrets
  • A story full of humor
  • A world filled with unique landscapes and colorful robots
  • Simple, colorful, and charming pixel art reminiscent of arcade games with a modern touch
  • A robot (you) whose memory holds mysteries and must hurry to save nature



So what are you waiting for? Take on the challenge! It’s free and packed with fun and content, thanks to numerous updates both past and future! Good luck.
"Ready? Set... JET!!!"

name: Super Jetboy World

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

short_description: Run and jump as fast as you can in this crazy adventure to beat your best score through futuristic platform levels and colorful pixelart, based on speed and strategy development to maximize your score. The competitive speedrun made accessible for everyone, whether it’s speed lovers or chill players!
